narrative.narrative: Bluebird Cargo is based at Keflavik,Iceland and is a part of the Icelandair Group. It was founded in 2000 and started with a single 737-300. It now has four of those and a 737-400 as of November 2014. It has a focus city at Cologne,Germany. As of May 2012 it served three airports in Italy,2 in Germany,1 in Belgium,1 in Slovenia,and Moncton in New Brunswick Canada.
